|default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} This FCC ID defines the AR-7084gA ([http://www.edimax.com/en/produce_detail.php?pd_id=129&pl1_id=3&pl2_id=19 Product page]) and the AR-7084-gB ([http://www.edimax.com/en/produce_detail.php?pd_id=236&pl1_id=3&pl2_id=19 Product page]). The specifications of the device appear the same.
v2.0?
"1244-00000494-01Z" is silkscreened on the board.
The FCC test report lists the following as identical models.. *Edimax AR-7084gA / AR-7084gB / GAR-D08gA / GAR-D08gB *Sitecom WL-174v1 / WL-127v1 / WL-175v1 *Micronet SP3367A/A / SP3367A/B *Topcom Wireless Webracer 8001A *IC INTRACOM 523455 *Ovislink AirLive WT-2000ARM ([http://www.airlive.com/products/WT-2000ARM/wt_2000arm.shtml Product page])
